General.Name: Fujian Funeng Co Ltd
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Fujian Funeng Co., Ltd. engages in power generation business in China. It generates electricity through wind and gas power, cogeneration, coal-fired, and photovoltaic power generation. The company has a total installed capacity of 2.38 billion kilowatts. In addition, the company offers medical, hygiene, automotive, and environmental protection filter materials. The company is based in Fuzhou, China. Fujian Funeng Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Fujian Energy Group Co., Ltd.

1.Name: Mr. Yuan Jun  Wang
1.Title: Sec. of the Board of Directors & Chief Legal Counsel
